pages.text: $(#ffa500)$(l)Just Enough Resources$(reset) (JER for short) is an addon for JEI. It adds a few different tabs to JEI to show you where to get stuff that doesn’t have a “normal” crafting recipe (i.e. mob drops, dungeon loot etc.).
Note that currently a missing feature in JER makes it so that the graph showing the different levels at which ores spawn $(l)is inaccurate for all ores$(reset), so you shouldn’t rely on that.
